title: Won my series but didn't rank up and lost 15 lp?
body:
won my series to plat 4 but i didnt rank up and it says i was unsuccessful in completing series. lost 15 lp.
i lost the first game and won the next 2 i played

replies.body: It sounds really strange that you would get demoted and lose LP as a result of winning a series, so I took a look into this for you.  It looks like you had 2 losses in your series which ended in losing the series and taking you down to 15 LP.  Since then, though, I see that you're back in a series!  Good luck and let me know if that clears things up!
Did you dodge in Champ Select?
